mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review ( user_id, review_content, review_pic_url, product_id, order_id, review_score, review_time ) VALUES(${review.userId}, #{review.reviewContent}, #{review.reviewPicUrlList, typeHandler=com.pro516.thrifttogetherbackstage.handler.PictureListHandler}, ${review.productId}, #{review.orderId}, ${review.reviewScore}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT review_id, ( SELECT username FROM USER WHERE id = user_id ) AS username, ( SELECT avator_url FROM USER WHERE id = user_id ) AS avator_url, review_content, review_pic_url, review_score, review_time FROM review WHERE product_id = ${productId} ORDER BY review_time DESC
